content:
# The second Stone Furnace now has 10 iron ore but is out of fuel, which means it cannot smelt the iron ore into iron plates.
# The first Stone Furnace still has 4 coal but has no ingredients to smelt.

# To resolve this, I need to ensure both furnaces have enough fuel. I will take some coal from my inventory and distribute it.

# 1. Let's insert 5 coal into the second Stone Furnace to fuel it.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, new_furnace, quantity=5)

# 2. Check the status of both furnaces and the inventory after inserting the coal.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")
print(f"Furnace 1 inventory: {inspect_inventory(get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace})[0])}")
print(f"Furnace 2 inventory: {inspect_inventory(new_furnace)}")
print(f"Inventory after coal insertion: {inspect_inventory()}")
